item.title: Let's Defend - Docker Forensics
item.description: Description Just Dive Into the DOCKER to REVEAL the layers Tools 1- Docker 2- Dive Writeup Q1 How many layers are in this docker container that u pull into your device? For this Question all u need to do after pulling the image into your local docker use the Dive tool to get all the layers dive mmox/what-is-0xl4ugh by just counting them we get the answer 23 Q2 What is the web server that the image used?
